question.text: Which of the following are not more basic than  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math> ?

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math> .

solution.text:
The basic strength of the hydroxides decreases as we move from cerium to lutetium Also the lanthanoid hydroxides are more basic than AlOH3 but less basic than CaOH2 .

BOH3 is more covalent than AlOH3.BeOH2 is as covalent as AlOH3 .

BOH3 is acidic while BeOH2 and AIOH3 are amphoteric while all others are more basic than AIOH3 .

Hence choice B is correct while A,B and D are incorrect.
